fields.name: Tech & Co Backpack
fields.description: The Tech & Co Backpack is a force to be reckoned with. It has an external padded, zipped laptop pocket that fits most 15 inch laptops. The front pocket is complete with a phone slot, pen slots and a clip to hang your keys on. All the zip pullers are designed so as you can get creative and easily attach your favourite bag charm. We've got your back.

fields.name: Tech & Co Mouse Pad
fields.description: Make your mouse super happy with our Typo mouse pads! They have amazing designs with a smooth surface that will ensure easy glide for your mouse. Our mouse pads are made from neoprene with a non-slip base.

fields.name: Tech & Co Notebook
fields.description: The notebook for the quintessential organiser. Separate your subjects and keep all of your notes, doodles, clippings and worksheets in the one fresh A5 sized notebook. In a range of seasonal prints and designs, these are a Typo signature stationery essential. You're welcome.

fields.name: Tech & Co Coffee Mug
fields.description: Our Anytime Mug is perfect for... you guessed it.. Anytime! A staple to drink your daily coffee out of.
